ComicInfo.Title: Spoiled Brat
ComicInfo.Summary:
Another new issue of Housewives at Play brings us teen pop sensation Bratty Sneers, who returns with a campaign to market her own line of "wholesome" dairy products. After all, growing bodies do need strong bones, and what better way to kick off her products than with everyone's favorite; milk. Only thing is, poor new mom Lynn (Cathy's sister) will have to work overtime since her lactation is the sole source for the singer's idea, as well as for her deviant sexual needs. "All natural, with nothing added"â€¦except for maybe a dildo or two, or three.
